ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup or Campbell's® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Chicken Soup
1 cup Pace Thick & Chunky Salsa Mild,Med,Hot CAM

cookingTips: Combine soup, salsa, and water before adding rice for even distribution
Let rice cool slightly before filling tortillas to prevent soggy wraps
Warm tortillas before filling for better flexibility
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I fill these wraps so they stay together and the filling doesn't fall out?
